outline:
1. to mount and ride, ride
    1. (Qal)
      1. to mount, mount and sit or ride
      2. to ride, be riding
      3. rider (subst)
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to cause to ride, cause to (mount and) ride
      2. to cause to draw (plough, etc)
      3. to cause to ride upon (fig)
kjv_def: bring (on (horse-) back), carry, get (oneself) up, on (horse-) back, put, (cause to, make to) ride (in a chariot, on, -r), set.
strongs_def: to ride (on an animal or in a vehicle); causatively, to place upon (for riding or generally), to despatch
